knimeNode.name: Matlab Plot
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create figures with Matlab from within KNIME.

fullDescription.intro:
The matlab plot node allows to produce any matlab plot with a script feeding the data from the kIn dataset into a plot function.
Make sure that mpicbg-matlab is running somewhere, and Knime is accordingly configured (Knime->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki
fullDescription.option: The width of the image to be written into the file
The height of the image to be written into the file

The output file name. The following placeholders are supported: $$DATE$$ for the current date, $$USER$$ for the username, $$WS$$ for the workspace directory, and FLOWVAR(varname) to use flow variable values in the file name

ports.inPort: A table which should be visualized with Matlab.
ports.outPort: The plot wrapped in an image node output.
